story.name: Upcoming Clubs
story.content: {"_uid":"44c004c8-1664-421f-85ce-8790427f98fb","body":[{"_uid":"bb97e346-3acb-45a2-8eb2-4e6aa551d09f","title":"","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Over the last 7 years, we've been on a journey from 9 men in one location to having over 3500 men attending our groups in over 150 locations - here's what is coming next ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"italic"}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"italic"}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"italic"}]},{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB Stoke-on-Trent, opening October 30th","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" - ","type":"text"},{"text":"Facebook Page","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61551633973475","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"url"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB Scunthorpe, opening October 30th ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":"-","type":"text"},{"text":" ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":"Facebook Page","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61551881112265","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"url"}}]},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB Edinburgh South Gyle, opening November 6th","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" - ","type":"text"},{"text":"Facebook Page","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.facebook.com/andysmanclubedinburgh","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"url"}}]},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB Stretford, opening November 13th","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" - ","type":"text"},{"text":"Facebook Page","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61552115170356","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"url"}}]},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB Bournemouth, opening November 13th ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":"- ","type":"text"},{"text":"Facebook Page","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61551955516586","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"url"}}]},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"Below are areas where the wheels are in motion for us to open new groups but logistics are preventing us from getting open, this can be for a variety of reasons, be that numbers of volunteers needed, or an appropriate venue not being available. If you can help in any of the areas mentioned please email info@andysmanclub.co.uk.","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"If you want to volunteer your support for any of the above events, or are happy with us keeping your details on file for support at any other events, please fill in the form attached - ","type":"text"},{"text":"Click Here","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://forms.gle/NTi4bPHu5w2RA4M87","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"url"}}]},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"If you want to be the first to hear about any new events we have planned, sign up to our mailing list here - ","type":"text"},{"text":"Click Here","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http://eepurl.com/hqlQib","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"url"}}]}]}]},"component":"centered","background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"9457e529-a39a-4daf-8396-5e9d385a1b7b","items":["fdc0fc40-7d47-444d-8a77-7f183d0b6395","5e58f4ec-ec05-4672-9f97-b159fdce92cb","9bd1cc14-3c8d-4f68-8219-44d5e7ecda04"],"component":"three-column-cards","custom_label":"","custom_title":"","background_color":"bg-white"}],"meta":{"_uid":"0bb8de66-9dfc-4e41-9962-6a3ec45e2b80","title":"Upcoming Clubs at ANDYSMANCLUB","plugin":"meta-fields","description":"Find out more about our upcoming clubs"},"component":"news_views","description":"ANDYSMANCLUB's list of upcoming clubs and areas we are exploring.","featured_image":{"id":null,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":null,"copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"}}
